name: ZekeRolandSupport
_source: speak;Zeke;Hey, big guy. How's it going?
speak;Roland;It's going great! Just splatting some monsters with my best bud!
speak;Zeke;Heh. Glad you're enjoying yourself, pal.
speak;Zeke;Me? Can't complain. The mission hasn't been too bad so far, and the new recruits seem like a good bunch.
speak;Roland;Even Sky? Thought you didn't like mingling with royals anymore.
speak;Zeke;As long as I'm getting paid, I don't care who's footing the bill. {c:expression;Zeke;CloseEyes}Still{tgm}...{tgm}
speak;Zeke;Maybe a bit. Sorry, I shouldn't let myself get distracted. Especially down here.
speak;Roland;If you need a sec, we can always stop for a bit.
speak;Zeke;Nah, I'm all good. Thanks, though.
